name: Nopalitos Con Papas
author: Arianna
summary: An authentic Mexican dish; tender cactus with potatoes. Cactus tastes like cooked green beans.
ingredients: 3  potatoes, peeled and cut into strips
1 (16 ounce) jar sliced nopalitos, drained and rinsed
directions: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add the potatoes, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally until they begin to soften, about 10 minutes
Stir in the nopalitos, onion, tomato, and jalapeno
Season to taste with salt, and continue cooking and stirring until the onion has softened and turned translucent, and the potatoes are tender, about 10 minutes more
